    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Fertilizer.useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
    The use tool override allows the Fertilizer to add experience and fertilize the crop in the tile.
    void
    Pickaxe.useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
    The use tool override allows the pickaxe to add experience and remove the rock from the tile.
    void
    Plow.useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
    The use tool override allows the plow to add experience and plow the the unplowed tile.
    void
    Shovel.useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
    The use tool override allows the shovel to add experience and shovel the withered crop in the tile.
    void
    Tools.useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
    The use tool function will serve as the main function to be overridden by its children functions.
    void
    WaterCan.useTool(Tile tile, Player player, int currentDay)
    The use tool override allows the watering can to add experience and water the crop in the tile.
